com.ubudu.sdk

Interface UbuduArea

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    UbuduBeaconRegion, UbuduGeofence

    public interface UbuduArea
    Interface represents Ubudu Area.

    • Method Detail

      • id

        java.lang.String id()
        The ID of the area. Notice: it is unique only amongst a specific subclass of UbuduArea; eg. a UbuduGeofence and a UbuduBeaconRegion may have the same id().
        Returns:
        id

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        Specific name of the area
        Returns:

      • hasGroupId

        boolean hasGroupId()
        Method checks if area has group id.
        Returns:
        It returns true if area has group id. Otherwise it returns fail

      • groupId

        Returns:
